name: SandBox - sand box
description:
Enjoy complete particle sandbox with rotation. You can use different elements, watch the interactions between component unit and see result.

Features:
• Specialists know the sand box is a great opportunity to work your creativity .
• Teachers know sandbox is a great way to teach item reaction to make new element.
• Play sand with thermal vision looks Garry's Mod called gmod.
• Such an innovative, awesome concept. Lots of fun with sandbox. Cannot wait to upgrade!
• The particles in sand box are very realistic, satisfying and relaxing

You can combine everything and blow up floating sandbox or ragdoll sandbox 2!
